New Records: Indonesia broke a streak that extends back to 2007 when they last won a group stage match in the Asian Cup against Bahrain
Indonesia climbed one spot to third place in the Group D standings with 3 points
Key Match Events: Asnawi Mangkualam scored the only goal of the match in the 39th minute
Jordi Amat was taken off on a stretcher after being elbowed by a Vietnam player
Pre-Game Insights: Indonesia opened with the attacking play Coach Shin Tae-Yong had promised before
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Shin lauded the performance of Asnawi Mangkualam
After years of not qualifying for the Asian Cup, this is a result that has brought joy to football fans across Indonesia
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indonesia's victory against Vietnam paves the way for a potential match with Australia in the last 16
Others: Indonesia will play their final group stage match against Japan on Jan. 24
